mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.item_class AS "itemClass", a.item_code AS "itemCode", a.item_name AS "itemName", a.input_code AS "inputCode", a.input_code_wb AS "inputCodeWb", a.expand1 AS "expand1", a.expand2 AS "expand2", a.expand3 AS "expand3", a.expand4 AS "expand4", a.expand5 AS "expand5", a.item_status AS "itemStatus", a.memo AS "memo", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.org_id AS "orgId"
mapper.select:
select a.item_Class,a.item_Name,a.item_Code,a.input_Code,sum(b.price)as sumPrice from clinic_item_dict a,price_list b,clinic_vs_charge c where a.item_code = c.clinic_item_code and c.charge_item_code = b.item_code and a.org_id = #{orgId} and a.del_flag = '0' and a.item_class = 'C'
and (upper(a.input_code) like upper(#{q}) || '%' or a.item_Name like #{q} || '%' or a.item_Code like #{q} || '%')
group by a.item_Class,a.item_Name,a.item_Code,a.input_Code
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO clinic_item_dict( id, item_class, item_code, item_name, input_code, input_code_wb, expand1, expand2, expand3, expand4, expand5, item_status, memo, remarks, update_by, create_by, update_date, del_flag, create_date, org_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{itemClass}, #{itemCode}, #{itemName}, #{inputCode}, #{inputCodeWb}, #{expand1}, #{expand2}, #{expand3}, #{expand4}, #{expand5}, #{itemStatus}, #{memo}, #{remarks}, #{updateBy.id}, #{createBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{createDate}, #{orgId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE clinic_item_dict SET item_class = #{itemClass}, item_code = #{itemCode}, item_name = #{itemName}, input_code = #{inputCode}, input_code_wb = #{inputCodeWb}, expand1 = #{expand1}, expand2 = #{expand2}, expand3 = #{expand3}, expand4 = #{expand4}, expand5 = #{expand5}, item_status = #{itemStatus}, memo = #{memo}, remarks = #{remarks}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, org_id = #{orgId} WHERE id = #{id}
